data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Chao, Zhang, Feng, Sharma, Prashant P. (2018): Two new species of Petrobunus from China (Opiliones: Laniatores: Petrobunidae). Zootaxa 4524 (1): 51-64, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.1.3|2 occurrences
